DESCRIPTION.P: After having used a graphics function, xchange computes pixel coordinates from real coordinates and conversely, according to the value of the parameter dir: "f2i" (float to int) means real to pixel and "i2f" (int to float) means pixel to real. x and y are the new coordinates of the set of points defined by the old coordinates x and y.
rect is the coordinates in pixel of the rectangle in which the plot was done: [upper-left point, width, height].
